Rebuild APK v.0.0.8 (mod debug) by alexvorxx 
 Original APK with native library by mittorn 
 https://github.com/mittorn/virglrenderer-android 
 https://github.com/mittorn/virglrenderer 
 
 The following code was used in this version: 
 
 virglrenderer-master (22.04.22): 
 https://github.com/freedesktop/virglrenderer 
 libepoxy-1.5.10: 
 https://github.com/anholt/libepoxy 
 gl4es-1.1.4: 
 https://github.com/ptitSeb/gl4es

.Help 

 - VTEST Protocol V2: With this on you can use VTEST_WIN=1 in exagear desktop shortcut env so you can render game directly in exagear window allowing fullscreen at lower resolutions. 

 - GLES 3.x: It will use Android optimized version of opengl instead of opengl. 

 - Multi-Thread EGL Access: Enables Multi thread, Multi-threaded rendering is best suited to applications that are CPU limited when compiling shaders or uploading data to the graphics driver. Multi-threaded rendering (when done sensibly) enables better distribution of driver work and allows applications to maintain consistent frame rates. (if your phone cores are capable of) 

 - Center Overlay - With this option active overlay will be created at the center of the screen instead of top-left. 

 - Disable Resize Overlay: This option will fixate the overlay size to fix the black rectangle bug that occur in some games. *VTEST_WIN=1 is necessary. 

 - DXTn (S3TC) decompress: Some games compresses their textures with this algorithm, without this option game textures will be glitched (Example South Park: TOST).
